text: About Last Night is a 1986 American romance-comedy-drama movie. Two people begin a relationship from a one-night stand after meeting in a Chicago bar. Demi Moore plays Debbie. Rob Lowe plays Danny. Megan Mullally plays Pat. This movie was released on July 2, 1986. It got very good reviews. A remake was released in 2014. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1986 comedy-drama movies Category:1986 romantic comedy movies Category:1986 romantic drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic drama movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies directed by Edward Zwick
title: About Last Night (1986 movie)
